definition: to pronounce especially publicly to be blameworthy or evil
examples: they denounced him as a bigot
Others might cry or get bent out of shape when their personal tastes are denounced and ridiculed, but not him …

definition: to inform (see inform sense intransitive 1) against : accuse
to announce formally the termination of (something, such as a treaty)
examples: denounced the arrangement with their former ally
